question: Format answer for: Regarding patient 'AII-11' from family 'Family A': What was the age at onset (AAO) of symptoms for this patient?
context:
Based on the information in Table 2 ("Clinical features of patients with p.D620N mutation") on page 3, the age at disease onset (y) for patient 'AII-11' was 62.

This is also stated in the "Clinical Presentation" section on page 3: "Patient AII-11 was a 77-year-old man who developed right upper limb rest tremor at age 62."
